function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on macroscopic epidemiological models","Impact":"Failure to accurately model disease spread and make informed decisions","Mitigation":"Incorporate micro-level data and modeling to account for individual mobility and interactions","Technologies":"Microscopic epidemiological models, agent-based modeling","People":"Decision makers, public health officials, epidemiologists","Owner":"Researchers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for individual mobility patterns and heterogeneity","Impact":"Inaccurate predictions of disease spread and impact of interventions","Mitigation":"Incorporate micro-level data and modeling to account for individual mobility and interactions","Technologies":"Agent-based modeling, data analytics, mobility tracking technologies","People":"Epidemiologists, data scientists, public health authorities","Owner":"Researchers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Limited consideration of population heterogeneity in transportation environments","Impact":"Underestimation of disease spread and impact on different population groups","Mitigation":"Incorporate micro-level data and modeling to account for population heterogeneity in transportation environments","Technologies":"Microscopic epidemiological models, transportation modeling, data analytics","People":"Transportation planners, public health officials, epidemiologists","Owner":"Researchers, transportation authorities"}]}
